name: Northwest Natural Holding Company
description: Northwest Natural Holding Company (NWN) is a leading provider of natural gas distribution services in the Pacific Northwest, primarily serving the states of Oregon and Washington. Founded in 1859, the company has grown to become one of the oldest and most respected utility companies in the region. NWN operates through its subsidiary, Northwest Natural Gas Company, which delivers natural gas to over 700,000 customers, including residential, commercial, and industrial users. The company focuses on providing reliable and affordable energy while maintaining a commitment to environmental stewardship and sustainability. In addition to its core natural gas distribution business, NWN is actively involved in renewable energy initiatives, including the development of renewable natural gas (RNG) projects and partnerships to promote energy efficiency. The company is also exploring innovative technologies to enhance its service delivery and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. With a strong emphasis on community engagement, Northwest Natural actively participates in local initiatives and programs aimed at improving the quality of life in the areas it serves. As the energy landscape evolves, NWN is dedicated to transitioning towards cleaner energy solutions, ensuring a sustainable future for its customers and the environment.

seo.meta_title: Northwest Natural Holding Company | Natural Gas Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Northwest Natural Holding Company, a leader in natural gas distribution in the Pacific Northwest, committed to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What services does Northwest Natural provide?
faq.answer: Northwest Natural provides natural gas distribution services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Northwest Natural?
faq.answer: David H. Anderson is the CEO of Northwest Natural Holding Company.

faq.question: Where is Northwest Natural headquartered?
faq.answer: Northwest Natural is headquartered in Portland, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: What is Northwest Natural's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Northwest Natural is committed to environmental stewardship and actively invests in renewable natural gas and energy efficiency initiatives.
